summary: A head and body replacer for the lovely Vilja. It's simply, the way I imagine her.
descriptionHtml:
[u][color=#00ff00][size=5][center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/87650/87650-1509490654-1697677620.jpeg[/img][/center][/size][/color][/u]


[size=4]Vilja has been a constant friend and companion since I first met her in Oblivion, many years ago. Many others have come and gone, but Vilja remains a favorite. I've been wanting to give her face a light makeover for sometime now. Nothing major. Just, softening her features slightly, letting her hair down and maybe, changing her body type. While I didn't intend to change her to this degree, this is how she ended up. I had a spare head, left over from my last project and adapted it for Vilja. The face shape, eyes and hair are a mash up, based loosely on two of my friends.[/size]



[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/87650/87650-1509490654-159171400.jpeg[/img][/center]
[center][/center]

[size=3]You need to install and load the original Vilja [color=#ffff00]BEFORE[/color] this. Link is in the credits below.

There are [color=#00ff00]3[/color] versions of this mod:

[color=#ffff00]Head Only [/color]

    Replaces Vilja's head
    Vilja uses whatever body is installed
    Does not use an ESP slot
    Requires Vilja In Skyrim to be installed and loaded [color=#ffff00]BEFORE[/color] this mod
    By default, Vilja uses whatever body and textures you have installed.
    

[color=#ffff00]Head and Body[/color]

    Replaces Vilja's head
    Gives Vilja a new body
    Does use an ESP slot
    Requires Vilja In Skyrim to be installed and loaded [color=#ffff00]BEFORE[/color] this mod
    An ESP is needed to point her to the new meshes and textures.
[/size]

[color=#ffff00][size=3]Head for Vilja Customizer Redux by ClearanceClarence 
[/size][/color][size=3]
   Requires [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61834]Vilja Customiser Redux [/url]to be loaded [color=#ffff00]BEFORE[/color] this mod
   Replaces Vilja's head
   Does not use an ESP slot
   Allows for different bodies and textures to be used
   Works for UNP and CBBE versions
   Safe to install/remove at any time
   CBBE version misplaces Vilja's hands and feet. The fix is
   posted on the customizer page


[color=#ffff00]Weight[/color][/size]
[size=3]
Vila's base weight is 75. If you wish to change this or her height, select her in the console and[/size]
[size=3]use the following commands in this order...[/size]

[size=3][font=Courier New]unequipall           (Remove clothes and their effects on the body)
setnpcweight x       (where x=0 to 100)
setscale y           (where y<1 for smaller, y>1 for taller, 1 for default)
disable
enable               (This will reset the ugly potato head)
unequipall           (Remove clothes to check results)
[/font]
If you get neck seam gap or overlap, try weight settings closer to 75
Vilja will have the UNPetite body. I have seen some of the fur armors cause a slight neck gap when worn.
[/size]
 


[color=#00ff00][size=4][center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/87650/87650-1509490654-1586899586.jpeg[/img][/center][/size][/color]


[size=3]Please don't post this mod on other sites, (Nexus only release)[/size]
[size=3]Edit, improve and modify as you see fit, just give me credit and think kindly of me on occasion...[/size]
[size=3]Please respect permissions for the assets I've used that were created by others.[/size]
[size=3]Please feel free to upload your own images, tips and suggestions for future ideas.[/size]




[color=#00ff00][size=4][center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/87650/87650-1509490655-2011182251.jpeg[/img][/center][/size][/color]
[size=3]


[/size][center][size=3]Some of these resources I've used. Some, I have gotten ideas and inspiration from.
[/size]
[size=3]A big thank you to all for the resources kindly shared, that we may all use, modify and learn from.[/size]
[size=3](If I've forgotten anybody or misinterpreted permissions, please PM me so I can rectify it.)
[/size][/center][size=3]
[/size]
[center][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26393/?]Vilja in Skyrim[/url] by Emma Amgepo Lycanthrops

[size=3]Without you, my mods would not be what they are now. I thank you.[/size][/center][size=3]
